dcterms:description: A fighting game platform used for AI development and health promotion, allowing for full-body motion control through middleware integration.
dcterms:title: FightingICE

dcterms:description: A database containing information on how much the player's body segments move when performing certain motions, used to analyze and predict player movements.
dcterms:title: Motion Database

dcterms:description: A database that stores probabilities of counteractions that players are likely to take in response to AI actions, built from gameplay logs.
dcterms:title: Action History Database

dcterms:description: Logs of gameplay that provide data on player actions and AI interactions, used to inform the AI's decision-making process.
dcterms:title: Gameplay Log

dcterms:description: A dataset representing the momentum of body movement, capturing the changes in body segment movements during gameplay.
dcterms:title: M2Mm (Momentum of body movement)

dcterms:description: A dataset that captures the counteractions players take in response to AI actions, used to predict player behavior.
dcterms:title: C2M (Counteraction to Motion)

dcterms:description: A dataset representing the probability of actions leading to counteractions, used for predicting player behavior in response to AI actions.
dcterms:title: A2C (Action-to-Counteraction probability)

dcterms:description: A dataset that captures the actual momentums of the player's body segments during gameplay, used for health assessment.
dcterms:title: Actual Momentums (AM)

dcterms:description: A dataset representing the expected momentums of the player's body segments, used to compare against actual momentums for health assessment.
dcterms:title: Expected Momentums (EM)
